body_text:
Has Kaido eaten a devil fruit? If so, what is its power? Kaido is called the strongest creature in the One Piece world. Hence, he must be immensely powerful. 
My question is: What is his power? Is he a devil fruit user?

If Kaido is DF eater, why doesn't he drown himself? Has Kaido eaten a devil fruit?
If Yes: Why doesn't he just jump into the sea if he wants to die that badly?
